languages.text: "Ваша Светлость желает осмотреть владения? Или, быть может, нам утолить ваше любопытство, ответив на несколько вопросов? Губернатор Урбенд Драйвстем извещен о вашем прибытии на Даргонус и посетит дворец в кратчайшие сроки. Подготовка к официальному визиту идет полным ходом, однако у Вашей Светлости достаточно времени перед встречей".

"Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость желает осмотреть владения? Или, быть может, нам утолить ваше любопытство, ответив на несколько вопросов? Губернатор Урбенд Драйвстем извещен о вашем прибытии на Даргонус и посетит дворец в кратчайшие сроки. Подготовка к официальному визиту идет полным ходом, однако у Вашей Светлости достаточно времени перед встречей".

traits.locale_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Drivestem and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are in full swing, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

languages.text: “您需要参观一下这座宫殿吗，大人？或者说，需要我们回答您什么问题，来满足您的好奇心吗？厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督已经收到了您抵达达戈努斯的通知，并在不久之后访问皇宫。正式访问的准备工作已经就绪，但在会议开始之前，您还有很多时间，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: “您需要参观一下这座宫殿吗，大人？或者说，需要我们回答您什么问题，来满足您的好奇心吗？厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督已经收到了您抵达达戈努斯的通知，并在不久之后访问皇宫。正式访问的准备工作已经就绪，但在会议开始之前，您还有很多时间，大人。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿le gustaría supervisar los terrenos? ¿O acaso prefiere saciar su curiosidad y hacer preguntas? El gobernador Urbend Drivestem ha sido informado de su llegada a Dargonus y pronto acudirá a palacio. Los preparativos de la visita oficial están en marcha, pero mi{mf|lord|lady} tiene tiempo de sobra antes de la reunión».
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ¿le gustaría supervisar los terrenos? ¿O acaso prefiere saciar su curiosidad y hacer preguntas? El gobernador Urbend Drivestem ha sido informado de su llegada a Dargonus y pronto acudirá a palacio. Los preparativos de la visita oficial están en marcha, pero mi{mf|lord|lady} tiene tiempo de sobra antes de la reunión».

languages.text: 「陛下、敷地内を見て回りますか？それとも、気になることがございましたらなんなりとお尋ねください。アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、あなたがダルゴナスに到着したと報告を受け、まもなく宮殿を訪問される予定です。公式訪問の準備は順調に進んでいますが、陛下にお会いするまでまだ時間がございます」
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、敷地内を見て回りますか？それとも、気になることがございましたらなんなりとお尋ねください。アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、あなたがダルゴナスに到着したと報告を受け、まもなく宮殿を訪問される予定です。公式訪問の準備は順調に進んでいますが、陛下にお会いするまでまだ時間がございます」

languages.text: "Möchten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} das Gelände inspizieren? Oder vielleicht könnten wir Eure Neugier befriedigen und etwaige Fragen beantworten? Gouverneur Urbend Drivestem wurde von Eurer Ankunft auf Dargonus unterrichtet und wird den Palast in Kürze besuchen. Die Vorbereitungen für den offiziellen Besuch verlaufen plangemäß, aber Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} hat bis dahin noch viel Zeit."
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: "Möchten Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} das Gelände inspizieren? Oder vielleicht könnten wir Eure Neugier befriedigen und etwaige Fragen beantworten? Gouverneur Urbend Drivestem wurde von Eurer Ankunft auf Dargonus unterrichtet und wird den Palast in Kürze besuchen. Die Vorbereitungen für den offiziellen Besuch verlaufen plangemäß, aber Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} hat bis dahin noch viel Zeit."

languages.text: « Votre Grâce souhaite-t-elle inspecter les lieux ? Ou peut-être pouvons-nous satisfaire votre curiosité en répondant à vos questions ? Le gouverneur Urbend Drivestem a été informé de votre arrivée sur Dargonus et devrait se présenter au palais sous peu. Les préparatifs pour cette visite officielle sont presque terminés, mais l'entrevue n'est pas prévue pour tout de suite, vous avez donc encore le temps de vaquer à vos occupations. »
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Grâce souhaite-t-elle inspecter les lieux ? Ou peut-être pouvons-nous satisfaire votre curiosité en répondant à vos questions ? Le gouverneur Urbend Drivestem a été informé de votre arrivée sur Dargonus et devrait se présenter au palais sous peu. Les préparatifs pour cette visite officielle sont presque terminés, mais l'entrevue n'est pas prévue pour tout de suite, vous avez donc encore le temps de vaquer à vos occupations. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri çevreyi kolaçan etmek isterler mi? Olmadı sormak istiyor olabileceğiniz soruları yanıtlayarak merakınızı giderebiliriz? Vali Urbend Drivestem, Dargonus'a gelişiniz konusunda haberdar edildi. Kısa süre içerisinde sarayda olacak. Resmî ziyaret hazırlıkları devam etmekte ancak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin toplantıya kadar bolca zamanı bulunuyor."
languages.original_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wish to survey the grounds? Or perhaps we could sate your curiosity by answering any questions you might have? Governor Urbend Drivestem has been notified of your arrival on Dargonus and will visit the palace shortly. The preparations for the official visit are well in hand, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} still has plenty of time before the meeting."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri çevreyi kolaçan etmek isterler mi? Belki de sormak istiyor olabileceğiniz soruları yanıtlayarak merakınızı giderebiliriz? Vali Urbend Drivestem, Dargonus'a gelişiniz konusunda haberdar edildi ve kısa süre içerisinde sarayı ziyaret edecek. Resmî ziyaret hazırlıkları devam etmekte ancak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin toplantıya kadar bolca zamanı bulunuyor."
